sections.title: Authentication
sections.description: To login, the user can use the following credentials: **userName** and **password**, or obtain the **code** from the **server** and then login. You can get the access code at: [Link](https://console.firebase.google.com/project/laundryservice1-3a280/database/laundryservice1-3a280-70fbd/data)

supSections.title: Login userName and password
supSections.description: You don't need the email here, just the userName and the password.

supSections.title: Login with code
supSections.description: You need to get the code from the server, then you can login with the code. on [Link](https://console.firebase.google.com/project/laundryservice1-3a280/database/laundryservice1-3a280-70fbd/data)

sections.title: Orders
sections.description: The orders are stored in the database, it has the needed informations for the orders and there status, and you can look for the orders by search **Order Number** , **Customer Name** or **Customer phoneNumber**.

sections.title: Prices
sections.description: Its the prices category, which means the price for each machine, for each price it has **Name**, **Price**

subSections.title: Edit price
subSections.description: You can edit the price by clicking on the price, and then you can edit the price and it will be auto saved.
